mapper.select: select comp_pk ,subject ,to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "reg_date" ,to_char(start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "start_time" ,to_char(end_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "end_time" from competition where c_no = #{c_no} order by comp_pk desc

select g_no ,content ,to_char(gonggoreg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "gonggoreg_date" ,to_char(opendate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "opendate" ,to_char(closedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "closedate" from gonggo where c_no = #{c_no} order by g_no desc
